snippet: Verizon has agreed to pay New York City at least $50 million for falling behind schedule in developing software for the new 911 system that then failed to meet city standards.
abstract: Verizon agrees to pay New York City at least $50 million for falling behind schedule in developing software for new 911 system that then failed to meet city standards.
lead_paragraph: Verizon has agreed to pay New York City at least $50 million for falling behind schedule in developing software for the new 911 system that then failed to meet city standards.

headline.main: Verizon to Pay City for Cost Overruns
headline.print_headline: Verizon to Pay City For Cost Overruns
